title: Rebuild Leisureflies site with chat functionality

requirements.text: Add a live chat widget or chat tab that allows visitors to initiate customer communication directly from the website

quotes: enter the chat option tab as well

acceptanceCriteria: A visible chat button or tab appears on all pages
Users can open the chat interface to send messages
Chat interface includes input field and send functionality
Chat state persists across page navigation

requirements.text: Implement SEO optimization for the lead generation website including meta tags, structured data, Open Graph tags, and semantic HTML
acceptanceCriteria: All pages include proper meta title and description tags
Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags are present
Structured data (JSON-LD) for Organization and LocalBusiness is included
Semantic HTML5 elements are used appropriately
Alt text is present on all images

requirements.text: Update destination images to be country-specific and contextually accurate (e.g., no desert safari images for European destinations)

quotes: Make the Images of packages as per the Country, For example you cant put Desert safari pic in Europe

acceptanceCriteria: Each destination uses images that accurately represent that specific country or region
Dubai/UAE destinations show desert, skyline, and Middle Eastern imagery
European destinations show European architecture, landscapes, and cultural sites
Asian destinations show appropriate regional imagery
All destination images are visually distinct and geographically accurate

requirements.text: Convert all pricing display from USD to INR currency format throughout the website

quotes: Also the rates mentioned should be In INR

acceptanceCriteria: All package prices display in INR with ₹ symbol
Number formatting follows Indian numbering system (lakhs, thousands)
Price ranges and estimates show INR currency
No USD or other currency symbols appear in pricing

requirements.text: Update the complete company name to 'Leisureflies Travels Pvt Ltd' (or 'LEISUREFLIES TRAVELS PRIVATE LIMITED' where formal) across all branding touchpoints

quotes: The Complete name of the company is Leisureflies Travels Pvt Ltd!!!

acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays 'Leisureflies Travels Pvt Ltd' or full legal name
About page uses complete formal company name
Page titles and meta tags reflect full company name
All branding elements use correct company name format

requirements.text: Add comprehensive contact details including corporate office (Chandigarh), branch office (Panchkula), departmental phone numbers, and email addresses to the Contact page
acceptanceCriteria: Corporate office address: SCO 70, Second Floor, Sector 38-C, Chandigarh with all phone numbers displayed
Branch office address: SCO 15, Second Floor, Sector 10, Panchkula 134109 with branch numbers
Departmental contacts section showing Air Ticketing, Holiday Packages, Visa Consultation, Branch Manager, Domestic Hotels, and Accounts numbers
Email (info@leisureflies.com) and website (www.leisureflies.com) are prominently displayed
Contact information is formatted clearly and grouped by location/department

requirements.text: Update the About Us page with the complete company profile including full service description, client focus, strengths, IATA/TAAI certifications, founding story (2010, Mr. Kamal Rana), and milestone of 53,000+ travelers served

quotes: About Us – Leisureflies Travels Pvt. Ltd.

acceptanceCriteria: About page includes the full company description as a comprehensive travel management company
Mentions IATA-accredited and TAAI-certified status
Includes founding information: established 2010 by Mr. Kamal Rana
Displays 53,000+ travelers served milestone
Describes service offerings: Luxury Holidays, Air Tickets, Hotels, Bus Service, Visa Consultation
Emphasizes client-focused approach and trust-based business partnerships
Notes presence in both Chandigarh (HQ) and Panchkula

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor.ts, main.tsx, or components/ui directory
Keep all existing inquiry submission and admin functionality intact
Preserve React + TypeScript + Tailwind + React Query stack
nonGoals: Integrating third-party chat services (Intercom, Zendesk, etc.)
Adding payment processing or booking systems
Implementing user accounts beyond Internet Identity admin access
